title: Thyssenkrupp Elevators plans Cobb County's tallest building
title_page: Thyssenkrupp Elevators plans Cobb County's tallest building
text:
Thyssenkrupp Elevators, a German company, announced Thursday that it plans to open a new North American headquarters in the Battery area of SunTrust Park in Cobb County.
The new facility is expected to create more than 600 jobs and Cobb’s tallest building--a 420-foot elevator test tower.
Thyssenkrupp will lease the land from the Atlanta Braves’ development company. The project will receive millions in local tax abatements.
A spokesperson for the Georgia Department of Economic Development said incentives from the state have not been finalized.
Read the full story, including details of tax breaks and incentives, here.
